radiographic_examinations.findings: Mild, scattered, nonspecific hypoattenuation of the periventricular and subcortical white matter bilaterally.
Mild, scattered hyperintensities in the periventricular and subcortical white matter.

radiographic_examinations.procedure_name: CT of the chest, abdomen, and pelvis
radiographic_examinations.findings: A small cluster of nodules and linear opacities in the right middle lobe and multilevel degenerative changes of the lumbar spine and bilateral hip joints.
